title: Album Item
description: A single artwork item in the album.

name.description: The name of the artwork. It can be empty if the artwork doesn't have a name.

description.description: A description of the artwork. It can be empty if the artwork doesn't have a description.

path.description: The relative path to the artwork image.

date.description: The date associated with the artwork, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

hidden.description: A flag indicating whether the artwork is hidden from the album.
